 2000-10952000-07-270FIN,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS to introduce a substantive definition of "scientific research and experimental development", add the cost of materials transformed in the prosecution of scientific research and experimental development to the list of deductible expenditures under section 37, and correct an error in the French version.
